thread.title: WATCH: Kansas' Carlton Bragg gets stuffed at the rim, by the rim
thread.title_full: WATCH: Kansas' Carlton Bragg gets stuffed at the rim, by the rim

author: Kyle Boone
title: WATCH: Kansas' Carlton Bragg gets stuffed at the rim, by the rim
text:
1h ago • 1 min read 
In the second half against Oklahoma, Kansas used a turnover on defense to create a huge transition opportunity by finding ultra-athletic big man Carlton Bragg for an easy dunk attempt on the other end. 
The Kansas faithful, ready to jump out of their seats in excitement, promptly plopped back into them after Bragg was denied at the rim and fell flat on his tush. — Deadspin (@Deadspin) February 28, 2017 
Just a bit short! 
Kansas might be needing those points, too. The Sooners and Jayhawks are knotted up in a close one on Kansas’ senior night. Add a comment
